note.value: This is a Judeo-Arabic, probably Karaite translation of North African origin, in Arabic script. The translation was clearly made from a Hebrew original. The text uses the "Maghrebine" form of 1 sg. imperfect (with the n- prefix): e.g., fol. 11v; the letter /f/ sometimes has a dot underneath. The translation is different from both Saadia and Yefet
